Text.Page:
Hurry over, step right up!!

It's time to play TERA's Super Quiz Bowl!

The rules are simple: Just read the question and move to the correct answer! The more answers you know, the more prizes you'll get!

And don't give up after just one wrong answer! There may be a consolation round.

Caution!
You must be present to win, and offer is not valid in the Dreamscape.
